snippet.textDisplay:
Are we all gonna just ignore how Isaiah pushed his arm forward after initial contact? Its not like his arm went down, he kept pushing for whatever dumb reason.

No, the ref being in the way is not cool and the dumb dumb shouldn't be there or at least fucking move given he saw them heading his direction. But why the fuck did Isaiah lunged his arm forward afterward? He even knew he ficked up when he tried to stop the ref lol. I don't know if he thought it was another Blazers player or a fan on the sideline, but lets not just gloss over the fact that the he also did that.
